name: Surviving Vampire
description:
Defend yourself from the hordes of humans that are out to get you. They attack during the day but your a Vampire so you can't be outside for long.

Build towers and collect the blood of fallen humans at night and watch and wait as the hordes come during the day.

Check the degrees at the top of your screen to determine where they're coming from.

WASD to move at night. 

Open your tower menu by pressing SPACE.
